Make-up master based in Zurich

Kristina Svetlichnaya

Makeup artist with over ten years of experience. I do make-up, hair-styling, eyebrows and eyelash lamination. I’m collaborating with Armani Beauty, Nyx, L’Oréal Paris, Lancôme, Vogue, L’Officiel.

Lashes & brows

Read description
While working I prefer using the best make up products: Beautiful and well groomed eyebrows and eyelashes are of great importance in our appearance. I do several procedures for eyebrows and eyelashes.

Hairstyle

Read description
My style when working with hair is naturalness, lightness and taking care of the client's hair. That's why I always choose very high quality hair products and always use thermal protection.
  • Evening hairstyle
  • For shooting
  • Wedding hairstyle
  • Shooting hairstyle
  • Wedding hairstyle
Portfolio

About my approach

My experience in beauty world is over ten years. I did collaborations with famous cosmetics brands. I create a complete look using makeup and styling for clients really often. For events, photo shoots and weddings. Mostly it is about light curls and bunches.
